Protocols/SwitchCellDelegate.html#/s:24Q.name: switchCell(_:didToggleSwitch:)
Protocols/SwitchCellDelegate.html#/s:24Q.abstract: Tells the delegate that the switch control is toggled.

Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.name: cellType
Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.abstract: The type of the table view cell to display the row.

Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.name: cellReuseIdentifier
Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.abstract: The reuse identifier of the table view cell to display the row.

Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.name: cellStyle
Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.abstract: The style of the table view cell to display the row.

Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.name: accessoryType
Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.abstract: The type of standard accessory view the cell should use.

Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.name: isSelectable
Protocols/RowStyle.html#/s:24QuickTableV.abstract: The flag that indicates whether the table view cell should trigger the action when selected.

Protocols/Row.html#/s:24QuickTableViewCo.name: action
Protocols/Row.html#/s:24QuickTableViewCo.abstract: A closure related to the action of the row.
Returns true iff lhs and rhs have equal titles and subtitles.

Protocols/Configurable.html#/s:24QuickTa.name: configure(with:)
Protocols/Configurable.html#/s:24QuickTa.abstract: Configure the receiver with an instance that conforms to Row & RowStyle.

Protocols/Configurable.html.name: Configurable
Protocols/Configurable.html.abstract: Any type that conforms to this protocol is able to take Row & RowStyle as the configuration.

Protocols/Row.html.name: Row
Protocols/Row.html.abstract: Any type that conforms to this protocol is capable of representing a row in a table view.

Protocols.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContro.name: NavigationRowCompatible
Protocols.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContro.abstract: This protocol defines the compatible interface of a NavigationRow regardless of its associated cell type.

Protocols.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContro.name: TapActionRowCompatible
Protocols.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContro.abstract: This protocol defines the compatible interface of a TapActionRow regardless of its associated cell type.

Protocols/OptionRowCompatible.html.name: OptionRowCompatible
Protocols/OptionRowCompatible.html.abstract: This protocol defines the compatible interface of an OptionRow regardless of its associated cell type.

Protocols/SwitchRowCompatible.html.name: SwitchRowCompatible
Protocols/SwitchRowCompatible.html.abstract: This protocol defines the compatible interface of a SwitchRow regardless of its associated cell type.

Protocols/RowStyle.html.name: RowStyle
Protocols/RowStyle.html.abstract: Any type that conforms to this protocol carries the info for the UI.

Protocols/SwitchCellDelegate.html.name: SwitchCellDelegate
Protocols/SwitchCellDelegate.html.abstract: The SwitchCellDelegate protocol allows the adopting delegate to respond to the UI interaction.

Enums/Subtitle.html#/s:24QuickTableViewC.name: style
Enums/Subtitle.html#/s:24QuickTableViewC.abstract: Returns the corresponding table view cell style.

Enums/Subtitle.html#/s:24QuickTableViewC.name: text
Enums/Subtitle.html#/s:24QuickTableViewC.abstract: Returns the associated text of the case.
Returns true iff lhs and rhs have equal texts in the same Subtitle.

Enums/Icon.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContr.name: named
Enums/Icon.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContr.abstract: Icon with an image of the given name for the normal state.

Enums/Icon.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContr.name: image
Enums/Icon.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContr.abstract: Icon with an image for the normal state.

Enums/Icon.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContr.name: images
Enums/Icon.html#/s:24QuickTableViewContr.abstract: Icon with images for the normal and highlighted states.
Returns true iff lhs and rhs have equal images and highlighted images.

Enums/Icon.html.name: Icon
Enums/Icon.html.abstract: A struct that represents the image used in a row.

Enums/Subtitle.html.name: Subtitle
Enums/Subtitle.html.abstract: An enum that represents a subtitle text with UITableViewCellStyle.

Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: init(title:customization:action:)
Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: Initializes a TapActionRow with a title, an action closure,

Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: action
Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: A closure that will be invoked when the row is selected.

Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: cellType
Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: The type of the table view cell to display the row.

Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: cellReuseIdentifier
Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: The reuse identifier of the table view cell to display the row. The default value is TapActionCell.

Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: isSelectable
Classes/TapActionRow.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: The TapActionRow is selectable when action is not nil.

Classes/TapActionCell.html#/c:@M@QuickTa.name: init(coder:)
Classes/TapActionCell.html#/c:@M@QuickTa.abstract: Overrides the designated initializer that returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/SwitchRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.name: init(title:switchValue:icon:customization:action:)
Classes/SwitchRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.abstract: Initializes a SwitchRow with a title, a switch state and an action closure.

Classes/SwitchRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.name: action
Classes/SwitchRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.abstract: A closure that will be invoked when the switchValue is changed.

Classes/SwitchRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.name: cellType
Classes/SwitchRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.abstract: The type of the table view cell to display the row.

Classes/SwitchRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.name: cellReuseIdentifier
Classes/SwitchRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.abstract: The reuse identifier of the table view cell to display the row. The default value is SwitchCell.
Returns true iff lhs and rhs have equal titles, switch values, and icons.

Classes/SwitchCell.html#/s:24QuickTableV.name: delegate
Classes/SwitchCell.html#/s:24QuickTableV.abstract: The switch cell’s delegate object, which should conform to SwitchCellDelegate.

Classes/SwitchCell.html#/c:@M@QuickTable.name: init(coder:)
Classes/SwitchCell.html#/c:@M@QuickTable.abstract: Overrides the designated initializer that returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/SwitchCell.html#/s:24QuickTableV.name: configure(with:)
Classes/SwitchCell.html#/s:24QuickTableV.abstract: Set up the switch control with the provided row.

Classes/Section.html#/s:24QuickTableView.name: init(title:rows:footer:)
Classes/Section.html#/s:24QuickTableView.abstract: Initializes a section with a nullable title, containing rows and an optional footer.

Classes/Section.html#/s:24QuickTableView.name: rows
Classes/Section.html#/s:24QuickTableView.abstract: The array of rows in the section.

Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: init(title:options:footer:)
Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: Initializes a section with a title, containing rows and an optional footer.

Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: rows
Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: The array of rows in the section.

Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: alwaysSelectsOneOption
Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: A boolean that indicates whether there’s always one option selected.

Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: options
Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: The array of options in the section. It’s identical to the rows.

Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: indexOfSelectedOption
Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: Returns the selected index, or nil when nothing is selected.

Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: selectedOption
Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: Returns the selected option row, or nil when nothing is selected.

Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.name: toggle(_:)
Classes/RadioSection.html#/s:24QuickTabl.abstract: Toggle the selection of the given option and keep options mutually exclusive.

Classes/QuickTableViewController.html#/s.name: clearsSelectionOnViewWillAppear
Classes/QuickTableViewController.html#/s.abstract: A Boolean value indicating if the controller clears the selection when the collection view appears.

Classes/QuickTableViewController.html#/s.name: tableView
Classes/QuickTableViewController.html#/s.abstract: Returns the table view managed by the controller object.

Classes/QuickTableViewController.html#/s.name: tableContents
Classes/QuickTableViewController.html#/s.abstract: The layout of sections and rows to display in the table view.

Classes/QuickTableViewController.html#/s.name: init(style:)
Classes/QuickTableViewController.html#/s.abstract: Initializes a table view controller to manage a table view of a given style.

Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.name: init(title:isSelected:icon:customization:action:)
Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.abstract: Initializes an OptionRow with a title, a selection state and an action closure.

Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.name: action
Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.abstract: A closure that will be invoked when the isSelected is changed.

Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.name: cellType
Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.abstract: The type of the table view cell to display the row.

Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.name: cellReuseIdentifier
Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.abstract: The reuse identifier of the table view cell to display the row. The default value is UITableViewCell.

Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.name: accessoryType
Classes/OptionRow.html#/s:24QuickTableVi.abstract: Returns .checkmark when the row is selected, otherwise returns .none.
Returns true iff lhs and rhs have equal titles, selection states, and icons.

Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.name: init(title:subtitle:icon:customization:action:)
Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.abstract: Initializes a NavigationRow with a title and a subtitle.

Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.name: action
Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.abstract: A closure that will be invoked when the row is selected.

Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.name: cellType
Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.abstract: The type of the table view cell to display the row.

Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.name: cellReuseIdentifier
Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.abstract: Returns the reuse identifier of the table view cell to display the row.

Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.name: cellStyle
Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.abstract: Returns the table view cell style for the specified subtitle.

Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.name: accessoryType
Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.abstract: Returns .disclosureIndicator when action is not nil, otherwise returns .none.

Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.name: isSelectable
Classes/NavigationRow.html#/s:24QuickTab.abstract: The NavigationRow is selectable when action is not nil.
Returns true iff lhs and rhs have equal titles, subtitles and icons.

Classes/NavigationRow.html.name: NavigationRow
Classes/NavigationRow.html.abstract: A class that represents a row that triggers certain navigation when selected.

Classes/OptionRow.html.name: OptionRow
Classes/OptionRow.html.abstract: A class that represents a row of selectable option.

Classes/QuickTableViewController.html.name: QuickTableViewController
Classes/QuickTableViewController.html.abstract: A table view controller that shows tableContents as formatted sections and rows.

Classes/RadioSection.html.name: RadioSection
Classes/RadioSection.html.abstract: A section that allows only one option selected in a table view.

Classes/Section.html.name: Section
Classes/Section.html.abstract: A class that represents a section in a table view.

Classes/SwitchCell.html.name: SwitchCell
Classes/SwitchCell.html.abstract: A UITableViewCell subclass that shows a UISwitch as the accessoryView.

Classes/SwitchRow.html.name: SwitchRow
Classes/SwitchRow.html.abstract: A class that represents a row with a switch.

Classes/TapActionCell.html.name: TapActionCell
Classes/TapActionCell.html.abstract: A UITableViewCell subclass with the title text center aligned.

Classes/TapActionRow.html.name: TapActionRow
Classes/TapActionRow.html.abstract: A class that represents a row that triggers certain action when selected.
